Description:
HotelDescription#The hotel is located on Sidi Zekri beach in Djerba, 3 km from Djerba Golf Club. Djerba Zarzis International Airport is 23 km away.

This beach hotel offers 176 fully equipped rooms in a typical Tunisian style as well as a number of restaurants and bars. Guests are welcomed into a lobby with 24-hour reception and check-out service. Facilities include air conditioning, a hotel safe, lift access, a newspaper stand, kids' club, disco and car park.

The hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with a private en suite bathroom with shower, bath and hairdryer. Each comes with a balcony overlooking the garden or Mediterranean Sea. The rooms are equipped with a satellite TV, double bed, direct dial telephone, safe and minibar.

Guests are invited to take advantage of the hotel's activities including horse riding, bocce, table tennis, tennis and volleyball. Guests can relax in one of four swimming pools including an open-air thermal pool, an outdoor freshwater pool with children's paddling pool, an indoor freshwater pool and a saltwater pool. There is also a children's swimming area and poolside snack bar. The resort features a private beach and guests have access to the hotel's thalassotherapy spa centre with hot tub, steam room, massages and spa treatments (all for a fee). Guests can also use the gym or go waterskiing, windsurfing, banana boating and catamaran boating. There are also sun loungers with parasols laid out on the sandy beach.

Guests have several dining options including the main restaurant, a terrace café and a pizzeria on the edge of the sea.
